summary: 2011 HYUNDAI VERACRUZ. CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO OIL LEAK ON ALTERNATOR.  THE CONSUMER STATED MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME DETERMINING A FIX FOR RECALL 121, CAMPAIGN 197. THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DETERMINE WHEN A REMEDY WOULD BECOME AVAILABLE. THE CONSUMER STATED THE VEHICLE WAS EMITTING A TOXIC ODOR FROM THE REAR AREA. VARIOUR WARNING LIGHT ILLUMINATE ON THE DASHBOARD.
